RotationSolver.Basic.Data.StateCommandTy: 以手动目标模式启动插件。您需要手动选择目标。 这将绕过您设置的任何触发设置，并且一旦选中目标将立即开始攻击。
停止插件，不用时一定要记得关闭。
在自动模式下启动插件。当战斗结束或战斗开始时，根据设定的条件切换目标。

开启一个自动使用突进技能的窗口期。
开启一个自动使用后退技能的窗口期。

开启一个自动使用爆发技能的窗口期。
在设定时间之前结束特殊窗口期。
开启一个自动使用职能技能“康复/盾姿/真北”的窗口期。
开启一个自动使用复活或退避的窗口期。
开启一个自动使用防击退的窗口期。
开启一个自动使用疾跑的窗口期。
RotationSolver.Basic.Data.TargetHostileT: 之前已经加入战斗的目标
RotationSolver.Data.UiString.ConfigWindo: 分析PvE战斗信息的每一帧并找到最佳技能。
不会吧不会吧，真有人偷懒捏！
你正在捆绑Rotation Solver，让它休息一下吧！
您选择的条件设置，点击进行修改。

这意味着在战斗中几乎所有可用的信息都集中在一个帧中，包括团队中所有玩家的状态、敌对目标的状态、技能冷却时间、角色的MP和HP、角色的位置、敌对目标的施法状态、连击、战斗持续时间、玩家等级等。

然后，它会在热栏上突出显示最佳技能，或者帮助您点击它。
它是为普通战斗设计的，而不是为高难或绝境战而设计的。小心使用。
Rotation Solver 帮助您点击 {0:N0} 次技能。
你已经对其他用户打招呼了 {0:N0} 次！
RotationSolver.UI.RotationConfigWindowTa: 某些东西必须是一个列表。
您所选职业的技能和自定义条件。
RotationSolver.Data.UiString.ConfigWindo: 要自定义RS何时自动使用特定的动作，请点击左侧列表中的动作图标。在下面的窗口，你可以设置使用该特定动作的条件。每个动作都可以有一组不同的条件来覆盖默认的循环操作。
强制条件具有较高的优先级。如果满足强制条件，将忽略禁用条件。
此文件夹包含循环库或循环库的下载URL。
RotationSolver.UI.RotationConfigWindowTa: 有些功能不应该包含在Rotation Solver中，但你依然可以使用。
Your custom time line about the specific duty.
寻找目标、敌人或朋友的方法。

在 CD 窗口中显示
此技能所需的目标 TTK。
Time to untargetable that this action needs the timeline be.
RotationSolver.Basic.Attributes.ConfigUn: 比率单位，按百分比计算。

点击以反转条件。

RotationSolver.Data.UiString.ConfigWindo: 在此窗口中，您可以设置可以使用列表自定义的参数。
忽略有以下状态的目标
优先攻击有以下状态的目标
Use tank personal damage mitigation abilities if the target is casting any of these actions
Use AoE damage mitigation abilities if the target is casting any of these actions
Enemies that will never be targeted.
The name of the enemy that you don't want to be targeted
Enemies that will never be provoked.
The name of the enemy that you don't want to be provoked
MistakeRatioName: 有多大的可能性RS会点击错误的技能。
NotInCombatDelayName: Random delay for Not In Combat.
ToggleAutoName: 将/rotation Auto 作为切换命令。
SayHelloToAllName: Say hello to all other users of Rotation Solver.
AutoOffBetweenAreaName: Turns auto mode  off when player is switching between different maps.
AutoOffCutSceneName: Turns auto mode off during cutscenes.
AutoOffWhenDeadName: Turns auto mode off when you die.
AutoOffWhenDutyCompletedName: Turns auto mode off when the duty in progress is completed.
AutoOffAfterCombatName: 战斗结束多久后自动关闭RS
StartOnCountdownName: Auto mode activation delay on countdown start.
StartOnAttackedBySomeoneName: Automatically turns on manual mode and targets enemy when being attacked.
RotationSolver.Data.UiString.ConfigWindo: 自动转为手动选择目标条件
自动转为自动选择目标条件
AutoOffAfterCombatTimeName: 战斗结束多久后自动关闭RS
CountdownDelayName: Random delay between for auto mode activation on countdown.
MinLastAbilityAdvancedName: The time ahead of the last oGCD before the next GCD being available to start trying using it (may affect skill weaving)
WeaponDelayName:
这是缩短时间。
GCD结束了。但是，RS忘记点击下一个技能。
MinUpdatingTimeName: Rotation Solver 获得游戏信息的最小时间间隔。
RotationSolver.Data.UiString.JobConfigTi: 这个配置是针对职业的
SpecialDurationName: The duration of special windows set by commands.
CountDownAheadName: Remaining countdown duration when abilities will start being used before finishing the countdown.
NoPingCheckName: Skips ping checking. Please use it along with NoClippy
RotationSolver.UI.RotationConfigWindowTa: 关于一些通用技能的使用与配置
OnlyShowWithHostileOrInDutyName: Only show these windows if there are enemies in or in duty.
DrawMeleeOffsetName: Draw the melee buffer area on the screen.
ShowMoveTargetName: Shows the target of the movement action.
ShowBeneficialPositionsName: 显示增益类放置技能位置.
ShowTargetDescription: Shows the next ability under the target and AoE attacks effect area
TargetIconSizeName: The size of the next ability that will be used icon.
ShowTargetTimeToKillName: Show the target's estimated time to kill.
TeachingModeDescription: Shows the next suggested ability that should be used
TeachingModeColorName: Prompt box color of teaching mode
UseOverlayWindowDescription: This overlay is used to display some extra information on your game window, such as target's positional, target and sub-target, etc.
UseTasksForOverlayName: Use tasks for making the overlay window faster.
BeneficialPositionColorName: The color of beneficial AoE positions
HoveredBeneficialPositionColorName: The color of the hovered beneficial position
SayOutStateChangedName: Audio notification for addon mode changes
ShowInfoOnDtrName: Display plugin status in server info bar
ShowInfoOnToastName: Displays plugin status with toast notifications
KeyBoardNoiseName: Simulates the effect of pressing abilities.
ShowToastsAboutDoActionName: Display manually triggered actions feedback on toast
ShowToggledActionInChatName: Display toggle action feedback on chat.
RotationSolver.Data.UiString.ConfigWindo: 更改Rotation Solver 自动使用技能的方式。
这将改变Rotation Solver使用这些技能的策略。
MeleeRangeOffsetName: Maximum melee range action usage before using offset setting
RotationSolver.Data.UiString.NotInJob:
This option is unavailable while using your current job.
Roles or jobs needed:
InterruptDelayName: Random delay for interrupting hostile targets.
InterruptibleMoreCheckName: 如果可能，使用打断的技能。
HealthForDyingTanksName: The HP%% for tanks to use invulnerability
HealthTankRatioName: Prioritize tank healing if its HP is lower than the selected percentage.
HealthHealerRatioName: Prioritize healer healing if its HP is lower than the selected percentage
HealOutOfCombatName: Heals players when not in combat.
UseHealWhenNotAHealerName: Use healing abilities when playing a non-healer role.
OnlyHotOnTanksName: Use single target healing over time actions only on tanks.
HealWhenNothingTodoName: Heal party members using GCD healing if there is nothing to do while in combat.
OnlyHealSelfWhenNoHealerName: Only Heal self when not a healer.
HealthDifferenceName: HP for standard deviation for using AoE heal.
AutoHealTimeToKillName: Stop healing when time to kill is lower then...
HealWhenNothingTodoBelowName: Heal party members that are lower then the selected percentage
HealWhenNothingTodoDelayName: Delay of this type of healing.
RotationSolver.Data.UiString.ConfigWindo: Rotation Solver 可以使用哪个技能
RaiseDelayName: Random delay for considering a ressurection type action.
RaisePlayerByCastingName: 即使即刻咏唱还在冷却也要复活
RaiseAllName: 复活任何玩家(即使他们不在你的队伍中)
RaiseBrinkOfDeathName: Raise players that have the Brink of Death debuff
LessMPNoRaiseName: Never ressurect players if MP is less than the set value
RotationSolver.Data.UiString.ConfigWindo: 你可以设定敌对的选择，以便于在战斗中灵活切换选择敌对的逻辑。
TargetDelayName: Random delay for finding a target.
AddEnemyListToHostileName: 将敌对列表添加至攻击目标
ChooseAttackMarkName: Priority attacks targets with attack markers.
FilterStopMarkName: Never attack targets with stop markers.
RotationSolver.Basic.Data.TargetHostileT: 所有的能够被打到的目标
All targets when solo, or previously engaged.
MoveTargetAngleName: The angle that targets can be selected as the move ability targets.
DistanceForMovingName: 如果和目标的距离小于此值，使用其作为伤害能力技使用。
MoveTowardsScreenCenterName: Use movement actions towards the closest object from the center of the screen
MoveAreaActionFarthestName: Targets movement area ability to the farthest possible location.
BossTimeToKillName: 如果目标整个死亡时间高于此值，则将其视为Boss
DyingTimeToKillName: 如果目标的死亡时间低于这个值，则认为其为濒死状态。
ChangeTargetForFateName: Consider only fate targets in the current fate area
OnlyAttackInViewName: Only attacks targets within camera view.
OnlyAttackInVisionConeName: Only attack the targets within the character's vision cone.
SwitchTargetFriendlyName: 治疗（增益）类技能只对队友释放
TargetAllForFriendlyName: Consider all players for friendly actions (include passerby).
MoveTowardsScreenCenterDescription: Use movement actions towards the closest object from the center of the screen, otherwise toward your current facing direction.
ShowTimelineDrawingName: Show the timeline assigned drawings in game.
EnableTimelineMovementName: Enable auto movement using timeline assignments.
RotationSolver.Data.UiString.ConfigWindo: Rotation Solver 的重点是循环本身。这些是辅助功能。如果有一些插件可以做到这一点，这些功能将被删除。
PoslockCastingName: Lock the movement when casting or when doing some other actions.
UseStopCastingName: 在目标死亡时停止施法
RotationSolver.Data.UiString.ConfigWindo: 在这个窗口，你可以设定释放特定技能后将自动触发哪个宏。
PoslockModifierName: The modifier key to unlock movement temporary
RotationSolver.Data.UiString.ConfigWindo: How many targets are needed to use this action.
TTKTextColorName: The text color of the time to kill indicator.
DrawMeleeOffsetDescription: Shows the area where no actions will be used between ranged and melee type actions.
SayHelloToUsersName: Say hello to the users of Rotation Solver.
JustSayHelloOnceName: Say hello only one time to the same user.
RotationSolver.Data.UiString.ConfigWindo: Here are some rating methods to analysis this rotation. Most of these methods need your engagement.
DefaultRotations.Healer.AST_Default.Name: UseEarthlyStarTime
DefaultRotations.Healer.AST_Default.Disp: Use Earthly Star during countdown timer.
RotationSolver.Basic.Data.SpecialCommand: Open a window to use limit break.
RotationSolver.Data.UiString.ConfigWindo: Please don't relog without closing the game. Crashes may occur.

Literally, Rotation Solver helps you to choose the target and then click the action. So any plugin that changes these will affect its decision.

Here is a list of known incompatible plugins:
Misleading RS to make the right decision.
Can't properly execute the behavior that RS wants to do.
The duty rotation you chose, click to modify.
Use knockback prevention abilities if the target is casting any of these actions
Should this action check the stauts.
How many gcds are needed to add the status.
The Animation lock time from individual actions. Here is 0.6s for example.
RaisePlayerBySwiftName: Raise player by using swiftcast if available
AutoSpeedOutOfCombatName: Use movement speed increase abilities when out of combat.
UseDefenseAbilityDescription: It is recommended to uncheck this option if you are playing high end content or if you can plan healing and defensive ability usage by yourself.
DefenseSingleDelayName: The random delay between for the auto defense single.
DefenseAreaDelayName: The random delay between for the auto defense area.
HealthForAutoDefenseName: HP%% for personal defense abilities usage for tanks
AntiKnockbackDelayName: The random delay between for the auto anti-knockback.
NoNewHostilesName: Don't attack new mobs by AoE.
UseAoeWhenManualName: Use AoE actions in manual mode.
NoNewHostilesDescription: Avoids usage of AoE abilities when new enemies would be aggroed.
ActionAheadDescription: This plugin helps you to use the right action during the combat. Here is a guide about the different options.
